title: Global production potential of green methanol based on variable renewable electricity
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE02951D, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Mahdi Fasihi, Christian Breyer
The production cost of green methanol from renewable electricity-based hydrogen and atmospheric carbon dioxide could reach market prices by 2040, making it a potential solution for defossilisation of the global chemical industry and marine transport.
